[[Gitai]], by extending one of his [[Earth Release: Demonic Rock Spider Armor|arms]], stamps the target with a scorching rock mark, which becomes implanted in the target. After it is implanted, the mark begins glowing, and explodes, destroying the target.

[[fr:Doton - Explosion de Roche Tamponnante]]
[[pt-br:Estilo Fogo e Terra: Pedregulho Explosivo]]
